author: archyde
title: The actor, director and author Andreas Marianos died – 2024-06-27 20:54:23
text:
The actor Andreas Marianos died. Spyros Bibilas, the member of Parliament for Freedom of Navigation and former president of the Greek Actors’ Union, made the unhappy information recognized in a publish on Instagram.
Andreas Marianos had, in line with Mr. Bibila, many issues however “he liked artwork and served it selflessly and was additionally a colleague, thinker and researcher of life and artwork”.
“Andreas Marianos is sadly now not right here… Farewell Andreas… expensive good friend and colleague… thinker researcher of life and artwork… You left laid low with many issues however you liked our artwork and served it selflessly. We are going to say goodbye to you on Saturday at 12.30 from the Zografou cemetery”, wrote Spyros Bibilas.
Andreas Marianos studied Theater and Cinema. studied Theater and Cinema. He labored in numerous specialties in Cinema or TV and as an actor.
He revealed two novels (Neos Theos 2010, 2017 and Agnostou Mitros 2012, 2014). An instance of his work within the theater are the performances Archmaster Solnes (2019), The Weight of the Physique (2019), 2 Tales of Selective Reminiscence (2016), Trumpet of the Angel (2017).
